segments.text: I see the little boy reaching for the cookie jar, and it’s the cutest thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s standing on that wobbly stool, but he’s so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl watching him, waiting for her turn, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they’re working together to sneak cookies is just precious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman would laugh if she saw them, but she’s too busy with the dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it might tip, but the boy is so focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how sneaky they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s little hand is reaching up, and it’s just too sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like they’re going to get away with it, and that makes me happy for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but the kids are making it fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
